mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") AS time, COUNT(*) AS total FROM product_buy WHERE create_time < now() AND create_time > date_sub(now() , interval 7 day) AND paystate=1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") AS time, COUNT(*) AS total,SUM(cost) AS cost FROM product_buy WHERE create_time < now() AND create_time > date_sub(now() , interval 7 day) AND paystate=1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT SUM(cost) AS cost FROM product_buy WHERE paystate = 1

SELECT pb.id, pb.product_id, pb.user_id, pb.create_time, pb.pay_time, pb.paystate, pb.cost, pb.status, p.introduction, p.name, p.plan_id, p.tele, p.url FROM product_buy pb, product p WHERE pb.product_id = p.id AND pb.user_id = #{id}
SELECT product_id as id, count(*) as value FROM product_buy GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT product_id as id, count(*) as value FROM product_buy WHERE paystate=1 GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY value DESC
